--- alter_table_drop_column.sql
alter table foo drop column bar

--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Name: &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 12,
        NameEnd: 15,
        Name: "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.DropColumn{
    Drop: 16,
    Name: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 28,
      NameEnd: 31,
      Name: "bar",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo DROP COLUMN bar
